<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120724</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120724</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Katera animacija predstavlja  katero barvo?</string>
            <string language="en">Which animation represents which color?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Animation stellt dar, die färben?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle animation représente qui colorent ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que animation representa que colorem?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quale animazione rappresenta che colorano?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποια ζωτικότητα αντιπροσωπεύει που χρωματίζουν;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué animación representa que colorean?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">3D animacija električnega in magnetnega polja pri treh različnih EM valovanjih.</string>
            <string language="en">Three animations of electric and magnetic field of different EM waves in 3D space.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">em valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektromagnetno valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drei Animationen von elektrischem und von magnetischem 
fangen von den unterschiedlichen EM Wellen im Platz 3D auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trois animations de champ électrique et magnétique de 
fin de support différente ondule dans l'espace 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Três animations do campo elétrico e magnético do EM 
diferente acenam no espaço 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tre animazioni del campo elettrico e magnetico del EM 
differente fluttua nello spazio 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρεις ζωτικότητες του ηλεκτρικού και μαγνητικού πεδίου
των διαφορετικών κυμάτων EM στο τρισδιάστατο διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tres animaciones del campo eléctrico y magnético de 
diverso EM agitan en el espacio 3D.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ondes électromagnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement électromagnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas eletromagnéticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação eletromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde elettromagnetiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radiazione elettromagnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητικά κύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητική ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas electromagnéticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiación electromágnetica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
